long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Vimeo Loop Master

Enhance your Vimeo viewing experience with Vimeo Loop Master, the Chrome extension that allows you to create custom loops on your favorite videos.

## Key Features:

- **Custom Loops**: Easily set start and end points to create loops on any part of the video.
- **Intuitive Interface**: Simple and immediate controls directly overlaid on the Vimeo player.
- **Flexibility**: Start and stop loops at any time during playback.
- **Compatibility**: Works on all Vimeo video pages.

## How It Works:

1. Install the extension and navigate to a Vimeo video.
2. Click on the extension icon to make the controls appear on the video.
3. Use the overlay controls to set the loop start and end times.
4. Click "Start Loop" to begin looping the selected section.
5. Use "Stop Loop" to return to normal playback.

Perfect for musicians studying specific passages, teachers wanting to emphasize certain moments, or anyone wishing to repeatedly enjoy their favorite parts of a video.

Vimeo Loop Master: Repeat, Learn, Enjoy!
